statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-4 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 1 , -x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 1 , -6 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x , -9 \, x^{3} + 17 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x - 1 , 4 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
